nodes.text: Katchan was a world that was located on the edge the Outer Rim Territories. It was the homeworld of the Katchani, a species of olive-skinned, elfish humanoids that were ruled by a monarchy. Katchan's surface was covered with forests, valleys, highlands and low mountains, and the planet was made up of two large continents separated only by a narrow sea. Katchan sat on the Corellian Trade Spine, near to the border of the Saijo sector.
The royal family of Katchan owned an A9G-series Data Storage Unit, until it was stolen by pirates.
